name: MorningRePete
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
"The songbird of our generation, Pete really knows how to gather an audience and captivate them with some of the most important information happening in the world around us. I would say that you must...nay, need...to listen to Morning RePete, I promise it will change your life." 
- Paul N. Carlin, United States Postmaster General, Jan 1 1985 - Jan 7 1986
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
